mapper.select: select * from user where nickname like concat('%',#{keyword},'%')
mapper.update: update user set email=#{email}, pwd=#{pwd}, nickname=#{nickname}, git_id=#{gitId}, git_url=#{gitUrl}, intro=#{intro}, img=#{img}, git_token=#{gitToken}, is_social=#{isSocial}, is_certified=#{isCertified} where id=#{id}
mapper.insert: insert into user (email, pwd, nickname, git_id, git_url, intro, img, git_token, is_social, is_certified) values (#{email}, #{pwd}, #{nickname}, #{gitId}, #{gitUrl}, #{intro}, #{img}, #{gitToken}, #{isSocial}, #{isCertified})
